mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET quantity=#{quantity} WHERE cart_no=#{cart_no}
mapper.select: SELECT ca.cart_no, cu.user_id AS user_id, cu.user_name AS user_name, ca.indate, it.item_name AS item_name, it.price AS item_price, ca.quantity, (ca.quantity*it.price) AS total FROM cart ca INNER JOIN user cu ON ca.user_no = cu.user_no INNER JOIN item it ON ca.item_no = it.item_no WHERE ca.cart_no=#{cart_no};
